Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_landusages_gen0 ORDER BY area DESC ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_landusages_gen1 ORDER BY area DESC ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_landusages ORDER BY area DESC ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_waterways WHERE type IN ('river', 'canal', 'stream') ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_waterways WHERE type IN ('river', 'canal', 'stream', 'ditch', 'drain') ) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry FROM osm_waterareas) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_ferryways) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type from osm_landusage_overlays_gen0 order by area desc) as landusages
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type from osm_landusage_overlays_gen1 order by area desc) as landusages
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type from osm_landusage_overlays order by area desc) as landusages
(SELECT rowid, geometry from osm_admin_gen0) as admin
(SELECT rowid, geometry from osm_admin_gen1) as admin
(SELECT rowid, geometry from osm_admin) as admin
(SELECT rowid, geometry, is_runway FROM osm_aeroways) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type, z_order FROM osm_tunnels ORDER BY z_order ASC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry FROM osm_turning_circles) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_roads ORDER BY z_order ASC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_roads_gen2 ORDER BY z_order ASC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_roads_gen1) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_motorways_gen0) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry FROM osm_turning_circles) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type, z_order FROM osm_bridges ORDER BY z_order ASC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry FROM osm_barrierpoints) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type FROM osm_barrierways) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_country ORDER BY population DESC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_state ORDER BY population DESC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_city ORDER BY z_order, population DESC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_town ORDER BY population DESC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_small ORDER BY z_order, population DESC) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name FROM osm_places_tiny) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, type, name, area FROM osm_area_labels ORDER BY area DESC) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, railway, name FROM osm_railway_stations) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, iata, name, CASE WHEN iata IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS hasiata FROM osm_airports) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, icon, color, name FROM osm_amenity_z13) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, icon, color, name FROM osm_amenity_z14) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, icon, color, name FROM osm_amenity_z15) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, icon, color, name FROM osm_amenity_z16) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, icon, color, name FROM osm_amenity_z17) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, feature, name FROM osm_amenity_fuel) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, bname FROM osm_building_labels) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name, ref, LENGTH(ref) AS reflen, oneway, type FROM osm_roads WHERE type IN ('motorway', 'trunk') AND (name IS NOT NULL OR ref IS NOT NULL)) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name, ref, LENGTH(ref) AS reflen, type FROM osm_roads_gen2 WHERE type IN ('motorway', 'trunk') AND (name IS NOT NULL OR ref IS NOT NULL)) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, name, ref, LENGTH(ref) AS reflen, type FROM osm_roads_gen1 WHERE type IN ('motorway', 'trunk') AND (name IS NOT NULL OR ref IS NOT NULL)) AS data
(SELECT rowid, geometry, ref, LENGTH(ref) AS reflen, type FROM osm_motorways_gen0 WHERE type IN ('motorway', 'trunk') AND (ref IS NOT NULL)) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type, name, oneway FROM osm_roads WHERE type IN ('primary', 'secondary', 'tertiary') AND (name IS NOT NULL OR oneway <> 0) ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type, name, oneway FROM osm_roads_gen2 WHERE type IN ('primary') AND (name IS NOT NULL OR oneway <> 0) ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type, name, oneway FROM osm_roads WHERE (NOT type IN ('motorway', 'trunk', 'primary', 'secondary', 'tertiary')) AND (name IS NOT NULL OR oneway <> 0) ) AS data
( SELECT rowid, geometry, type, name FROM osm_waterways WHERE type IN ('canal', 'river', 'stream') AND name IS NOT NULL ) AS data
